name: Case Manager
short_description:
Case Manager is an easy to install and use Javascript/PHP/MySQL web application for use in social work agencies that use a case management model, espeically those in the mental health sector. It's corporate sponsor, Reconnect Mental Health Services Inc., is a community, not-for-profit mental health agency that provides case management services to clients with complex needs.

Case Manager is open source, copyrighted software that is free for all to use and develop subject to the GNU License. Professional support services and customization of the software are available from Reconnect at very reasonable rates. For more informaiton, contact Reconnect directly at 416-248-2050, ext. 0.
summary: Case Management Software for the NFP Mental Health Sector
